subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to give a loan for a low month payment
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
$287,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this elementary form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://siruisxkcinaltd.com/
